item.title: Options trade shows no smooth sailing for bulls yet amid rising tariff tensions

review.headline_rewrite: Options trade shows no smooth sailing for bulls yet amid rising tariff tensions
bullets: Options trade shows no smooth sailing for bulls yet amid rising tariff tensions Market must breach Tuesday high of 24,756 points for the uptrend
Amid rising tariff tensions between India and the US, challenges have cropped up for stock market bulls yet again.
The aggregate value of puts exceeded that of calls by ₹1,181 crore on Monday.

item.title: Anlon Healthcare share price trades flat after muted listing. Should you buy, sell or hold?

review.headline_rewrite: Anlon Healthcare share price trades flat after muted listing. Should you buy, sell or hold?
bullets: The initial public offering (IPO) of the chemical manufacturing company saw decent demand, and the Anlon Healthcare IPO listing date was today, 3 September
Anlon Healthcare shares got listed at ₹92 on the NSE, up 1.10% over its issue price of ₹91.
On the BSE, Anlon Healthcare share price debuted at par to the issue price of ₹91.
Anlon Healthcare IPO listing was in-line with the muted Street expectations as seen from the trends in the grey market premium (GMP).
